title: LF Top laner and a support to fill a team for Oceanic Open ladder.
body:
Title is pretty self explanatory, just fill out the form below and I'll get back to you for trials:

Rank:
Role:
Champion pool for role:
Do you have Curse Voice?:
Why do you want to compete?:

Thanks guys.

replies.body:
Rank: Gold 5
IGN: BackFire
Role: Any, but my strongest are ADC and Mid
Champion pool for role: I can play any champion required but my strongest are; Syndra, Zed, Caitlyn, Jinx, Kalista, Riven, Orianna, Vayne and Malzahar.
Do you have Curse Voice?: Yes and skype.
Why do you want to compete?: To learn more about the game and become a better team player to one day compete in a competitive scene as a job.

Gold 4  ign Wolves
Any role
Any can learn 
I want to get better and win rp xD
and yes i have curse

only problem availability 9.30pm till 2am on weekdays AEST
full day weekends

Rank: Silver 2

Role: Support

Champion pool for role:  Leona, Braum, Nami, Thresh, Morgana, Janna

Do you have Curse Voice?: Yes But have never used it once yet.

Why do you want to compete?: Because I want to prove I can be one of the best supports in this region all I need is to keep practicing and be with a team that can notice my skills

Rank: s5 (back and forth between s2 and 5)
Role:support pref
Champion pool for role: morgana, sona, leona, volibear, (pretty non meta but it works in the right team comp, so veigar) can play plenty of others theyre just my top picks
Do you have Curse Voice?: yup
Why do you want to compete?: Because i want to catch them all ;) (and maybe win)
